name: Dr. Emily Johnson
text: Dr. Johnson has been part of ourUNI for the past 7 years. She is known for her engaging lectures in English Literature and has published several research papers on modern poetry and comparative literature.

name: Prof. Arman Petrosyan
text: Prof. Petrosyan has dedicated over 12 years to ourUNI, contributing greatly to the Computer Science faculty. He is highly respected for his work in artificial intelligence and his mentorship of senior thesis projects.

name: Dr. Hiroshi Tanaka
text: For 7 years, Dr. Tanaka has brought her expertise in environmental sciences to ourUNI. She actively participates in international research collaborations and has led multiple sustainability projects on campus.

name: Prof. Maria Martinez
text: Prof. Martinez has been a core member of the Sociology department at ourUNI for 11 years. Her lectures focus on social justice, gender studies, and cultural theory, and she is deeply involved in community outreach programs.

name: Dr. Narek Mkrtchyan
text: With 15 years of service, Dr. Mkrtchyan is one of the most experienced faculty members in the Physics department. He specializes in quantum mechanics and supervises both undergraduate and graduate research students.

name: Prof. Jacob Smith
text: Prof. Smith has been teaching Business and Management courses at ourUNI for 5 years. He brings practical industry experience to his classes and is known for helping students launch real-world startup ideas.

name: Dr. Anna Müller
text: Dr. Müller is a linguistics expert who has been with ourUNI for 6 years. Her classes focus on language acquisition, phonetics, and translation studies.

name: Prof. George Allen
text: A former city planner, Prof. Allen teaches Urban Design and Smart City Development. He joined ourUNI 9 years ago and frequently collaborates on national infrastructure projects.

name: Dr. Sophie Laurent
text: Dr. Laurent, a specialist in biotechnology, has led several cutting-edge research programs. She joined the Health & Life Sciences faculty 8 years ago.

name: Prof. Tigran Davtyan
text: Prof. Davtyan is an authority in Constitutional Law and Human Rights. With 18 years at ourUNI, he is also a practicing legal advisor for civic institutions.

name: Dr. Lina Kovács
text: Dr. Kovács lectures on Microeconomics and Development Finance. Her case-study based approach is popular among business students.

name: Prof. Samuel Wright
text: Prof. Wright leads workshops in creative writing and has published two award-winning novels. He's been at ourUNI since 2013.

name: Dr. Elene Beridze
text: An expert in Food Safety and Agricultural Biotechnology, Dr. Beridze has been developing sustainable farming methods in collaboration with European institutions.

name: Prof. Michael Zhang
text: Prof. Zhang teaches game design and 3D modeling. He encourages creativity in his project-based courses and has a background in indie game development.

name: Dr. Narine Sargsyan
text: Dr. Sargsyan has a deep focus on mental health in adolescents and teaches Psychology of Learning. She's been active in regional mental health advocacy.

name: Prof. Liam O'Connor
text: With a background in international economics, Prof. O'Connor teaches Global Markets and Trade Policies. He has been part of ourUNI for 10 years.

name: Dr. Zaruhi Babayan
text: Dr. Babayan is known for her work in early childhood education and curriculum development. Her innovative methods are being adopted by local schools.

name: Prof. Omar El-Sayed
text: Prof. El-Sayed teaches Philosophy and Critical Thinking. He challenges students to debate and question assumptions in every lecture.

name: Dr. Aylin Demir
text: Specializing in Pharmacology, Dr. Demir brings clinical insights to the classroom and oversees interdisciplinary medical research.

name: Prof. Benjamin Lee
text: A visual communication expert, Prof. Lee teaches courses in branding, media design, and digital storytelling. He joined ourUNI in 2016.

name: Dr. Karine Aleksanyan
text: Dr. Aleksanyan is a climate policy researcher who leads Environmental Law seminars. Her interdisciplinary work links law and sustainability.

name: Prof. Alexei Ivanov
text: An award-winning historian, Prof. Ivanov lectures on 20th-century European history and historical methodology. He’s known for his captivating storytelling in class.

name: Dr. Jasmine Noor
text: Dr. Noor specializes in Medical Ethics and has been guiding students through complex healthcare dilemmas for over 8 years. She also leads monthly bioethics forums at ourUNI.

name: Prof. Artur Hakobyan
text: Prof. Hakobyan has been teaching mathematics at ourUNI for over 20 years. His courses in linear algebra and calculus are known for clarity and real-life applications.

name: Dr. Clara Mensah
text: Dr. Mensah has led groundbreaking research in renewable energy systems. She teaches Environmental Engineering and mentors students in green tech startups.

name: Prof. Reza Alizadeh
text: Prof. Alizadeh teaches International Law and Comparative Legal Systems. He frequently contributes to international legal journals and symposiums.

name: Dr. Miriam Goldstein
text: With a PhD in Visual Culture, Dr. Goldstein lectures on Film Theory and Postmodern Art. She also curates student exhibits at the ourUNI Gallery.

name: Prof. Davit Sahakyan
text: Prof. Sahakyan leads the Mobile App Development Lab at ourUNI and mentors capstone teams in both Android and iOS projects.

name: Dr. Fiona Gallagher
text: Dr. Gallagher is a well-respected Nursing educator with a passion for community health. She’s also a coordinator for practical training at local hospitals.

name: Prof. Jean-Michel Dubois
text: Prof. Dubois teaches European Political Systems and specializes in comparative government models. He’s been teaching at ourUNI for over a decade.
